text: Moominiiney korosuk sin Qidah yan mara ken elle geyinnaanih Aracal ken Qida, sin kak yeyyeeqen Aracak (makka kinnuk) ken eyyeeqa, fitna (Yallat Agleyta haanam kinnuk) isin Caramal ken Qiddaanamak umaaneh gibiduk Raqtak, caram masgiidih xaqul isin Qeb Qimbisak keenilluk maamina Qeb usun Qimbisaanaah Siinilluk kay Addal oommu iyyaanam fanah, usun Caram masgiidih xaqul Qeb siinit Abeeniih Qimbiseenik, Toysa isin too Aracal keenilluk oomiyaay ken Qida, tamannah tan galto koroositeh yan marih galto
